backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing implemented UI changes and related source files for two greeting-page features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file providing short predefined summaries for main frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and dark mode styles applied to the frontend layout.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point containing the root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the Hug Day greeting and the floating emoji overlay.
frontend/src/components/FloatingEmojiRai: Generates continuous and burst-based floating emoji animations and cleans them after animation ends.
frontend/src/components/HugDayGreeting.t: Displays the Hug Day greeting layout including hero emoji, photo, long message, and signature.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles including Poppins font, page gradient, emoji animations, and Hug Day color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file initializing query client, identity provider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark‑mode support, content paths, extended theme colors using OKLCH variables, custom fonts, animations, and includes typography, container query, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, and architectural notes for a Hug Day greeting page with animations and styling requirements.
